Contributing¶

Ideas and pull requests are welcome! Please feel free to submit bug reports or pull requests on the github repo.

If you do submit a pull request, please consider running the tests and (if applicable) adding test coverage for your changes. There’s also an AUTHORS.rst file containing all of the people who have contributed code. Please add yourself.

Thank You in advance!
